thread.title: Neil Cavuto's mea culpa as CIA 'operative' accused of lying - KCRA-TV Sacramento
thread.title_full: Neil Cavuto's mea culpa as CIA 'operative' accused of lying - KCRA-TV Sacramento - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: KCRA-TV Sacramento
title: Neil Cavuto's mea culpa as CIA 'operative' accused of lying - KCRA-TV Sacramento
text:
In a rare mea culpa on Friday, Fox News anchor Neil Cavuto took responsibility for appearances by a recurring guest who has been charged with falsely claiming that he worked for the CIA. The anchorman's comments came one day after conservative commentator Wayne Simmons was arrested.
 KCRA-TV Sacramento.
